topic.title: HUMAN EPIDERMAL GROWTH FACTOR IN SITU HYBRIDISATION RECEPTOR STATUS FOR BREAST
topic.shortdesc: The receptor status of the Human Epidermal growth factor Receptor (HER2) ISH (in situ hybridization) obtained from a PATIENT with breast cancer during a Breast Cancer Care Spell.
